text: Nature Valley is a brand of granola bar. They are owned by General Mills. Nature Valley claims to have made the world's first granola bar in 1975 but it has also been disputed that the real inventor was Simcoe president Stanley Mason. Nature Valley is popular in the United States. It was the most popular brand of granola bar in the US in a 2023 poll. Aside from the original flavor, Nature Valley also have Fruit & Nut bars, protein bars, muffin, and water bars. They come in many different flavors. == References == ==Other website== * Category:1975 establishments Category:Snack foods
title: Nature Valley
